data.Name: UPSAHL
data.Bio: Taylor Upsahl, best known by her stage name Upsahl, is an American singer-songwriter. Upsahl gained popularity through TikTok with the song "Drugs" in 2019 and released the "Young Life Crisis" EP in 2020. Upsahl's debut album, "Lady Jesus" was released in 2021. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Upsahl
